sentence: The hotel staff and catering staff go out of their way to make sure you and your guests have an awesome experience
This hotel is fortunate to have her experience knowledge patience kindness and wonderful disposition
Great experience we had stay there again
The setting was very intimate and the comedy was perfect
She offered to do anything to make my stay better which was not necessary as I told her my experience was greatThe other MODs and staff I passed in the hallway or elevator were always friendly
overall good experience
Overall a pleasant experience with the train station right out the door I was able to travel all over Bethesda DC and Virginia with the utmost ease
I would highly recommend any event be held at the Hyat and definitely ask for Joseph and Riad by name for the best experience
i travel for work 40 weeks per year and have had the best experience with this establishment
I had two great experiences during my visit at the bar lounge with Hakim

Grandeur Grand location right over Bethesda Metro station no noise problems Grand architecture with Hyats signature open core and glass elevators Comfortable bedsDetails Room for two has one desk chair no armchair no place for the second guest to sit other than the toilet No space dedicated to luggage not even a luggage rack you have to ask Plumbing fixtures leak Desk table visibly worn around the edges
My other family members who stayed this weekend had similar experiences
Fortunately the General Manager was sympathetic to our complaints and comped a couple of nights but our experience was so bad we will not stay there again
worst hotel stay experience i ever had i would never recommend to any one
Hotel is being renovated so not much of an ambiance
Worst hotel experience in my life
We checked out a day early because the experience was far from the romantic weekend we had planned and will never go back
I am both surprised and disappointed with my most recent experience stay
This hotel is pathetic I am still staying here and I know instead of resolving my issues I will receive a response from the hotel Authority I sincerely apologize for the concerns you experienced
Elevators were under construction but did not hurt the experience
The service is the worst I have ever experienced in a hotel
This hotel is not on par with other Hyat experiences we had in the past in other states
This is with no doubt the worst experience I have ever had in any hotel in the US
Otherwise my experience was awesome and the interactions with the staff was professional and friendly
They have been remodeling this year but that has not diminished my experience
If you choose the wrong set of elevators like I did you wind up in an abutting office complex where on a weekend there is not a soul kind of like a scene from the Twilight Zone
It was a GREAT experience but I will not do it again because of the parking
This should be made clearer to provide a better experience
Worse experience at a Hyat ever
